description:
In matters involving personal injury, work accidents, disability benefits, criminal defense and estate planning, the Law Offices of Anthony Urban, P.C., in Mahanoy City, Pennsylvania, provides dedicated, personalized services to people throughout Central, Southeastern and Northern Pennsylvania. For over 50 years, we have been fighting for justice for our clients.

In all personal injury cases, time is of the essence. Pennsylvania has strict statutes of limitations that prevent people from filing an action after the deadline has passed. We respond promptly to calls and work to resolve issues quickly and efficiently. Our attorneys are happy to advise clients when settlements are fair, and when they are not, we are ready to fight on their behalf in court. The law offices handle cases involving the following:

  • Animal attacks
  • Medical mistakes
  • Faulty products
  • Class action lawsuits
  • Birth injuries
  • Traumatic brain injuries
  • Dangerous property conditions
  • Work accidents
  • Toxic mold
  • Toxic torts
  • Construction accidents
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Sexual abuse

Family members who lose a loved one due to a fatal injury come to us for assistance in filing a wrongful death claim. We also help clients file for Social Security Disability benefits, workers' compensation and other programs designed to protect workers after accidents or exposure to toxic substances compromise their health and well-being.

When people are facing charges for theft, DUI, drug violations, white collar crimes, violent offenses or juvenile offenses, we develop customized defense strategies designed to mitigate penalties and restore the freedom and future of our clients. We also fight for them in civil rights violations cases.

The Law Offices of Anthony Urban, P.C., has offices in Mount Carmel and Pottsville. Clients may also visit with us via video appointment. The first visit is always free.
